sentences.en: Her findings have been widely disseminated .
IE Superman is a completely free, you can use and disseminate it.
sentences.cn: IE超人是完全免费的, 您可以使用和传播它.

sentences.en: If you are not the named addressee you should not disseminate, distribute or copy this e - mail .
sentences.cn: 如果您不是指定的收信人,您不应该传播, 发布或复制这 电子邮件.

sentences.en: In the intermediate term ( 10 ~15 years ), stepstep disseminate the DME as alternative of diesel fuel.
sentences.cn: 中期 ( 10~15年 ) 逐步推广二甲醚替代柴油,可以从公共汽车和卡车起步.

sentences.en: It is essential to widely disseminate these ideas among young people.
sentences.cn: 在青年里面应该广泛地宣传这些思想.

sentences.en: Participating societies endorsed the recommendations and agreed to help disseminate the results.
sentences.cn: 与会科学家签名认可,并同意协助传播.

sentences.en: Popularize the Olympic knowledge and disseminate the Olympic ideas through various forms.
sentences.cn: 通过多种形式普及奥林匹克知识,传播奥林匹克理念.

sentences.en: Poultry hauling equipment likewise can disseminate infectious material.
sentences.cn: 捕鸡器械同样也能播散传染性物质.

sentences.en: Schools, in various forms, and teachers disseminate knowledge locally.
sentences.cn: 各式各样的学校和教师都在地方上传播知识.

sentences.en: The agency would collect and disseminate information.
sentences.cn: 通讯社收集和传播讯息.

sentences.en: They can disseminate what they learn more widely and more quickly.
sentences.cn: 他们可以把他们了解到的更快更广泛地传播开去.

sentences.en: They use the press to disseminate right - wing views.
sentences.cn: 他们利用报刊来传播 右翼 观点.

sentences.en: We should disseminate science and promote the scientific spirit.
sentences.cn: 普及科学知识,弘扬科学精神.

sentences.en: We sincerely welcome all countries to disseminate their languages in China.
sentences.cn: 我们真诚地欢迎世界各国来华推广本国语言.

trans.tran_en: to spread information or ideas to as many people as possible
